overview.title: Complete Property Management Solution
overview.description: SmartHoster.io provides end-to-end property management services designed specifically for the Portuguese market. Our platform combines advanced technology with local expertise to maximize your rental income while minimizing your operational overhead.

benefits.revenue: Increase rental revenue by up to 35%
benefits.automation: Automated operations reduce your workload by 90%

services.title: We Handle Everything — Start to Finish
services.subtitle: Especially if you've just purchased a property, we'll guide you through every step of setup — and execute the majority of it on your behalf.
setupServices: Utilities, internet, TV, and smart lock setup
SEF / AIMA integration for guest reporting
INE reporting, Bank of Portugal registration, Model 30 filing

important.title: Important:
important.description: While these setup and legalization services are part of our management process, they are negotiated separately during onboarding based on your property's needs. No two setups are the same — and we tailor everything to your situation.

marketing.title: Marketing & Distribution
marketing.description: Professional photography, optimized listings across 50+ platforms, and strategic pricing to maximize visibility and bookings.

guest.title: Guest Management
guest.description: Complete guest communication, automated check-in/check-out, 24/7 support, and personalized guest experiences.

operations.title: Property Operations
operations.description: Coordinated cleaning, maintenance, inspections, and quality assurance to keep your property in perfect condition.

financial.title: Financial Management
financial.description: Automated invoicing, commission tracking, tax reporting, and detailed financial analytics and reporting.

technology.title: What happens after setup?
technology.description: Once setup is complete, SmartHoster takes over the day-to-day management of your rental — combining automation, human support, and proven systems.
ongoingServices: Guest communication from pre-booking to post-review
SAF/AT billing automation and optional city tax filing
Live dashboards showing earnings and occupancy
Owner portal for full transparency and control
technology.optimizationNote: We regularly test headlines, descriptions, and photos to improve your rankings and maximize bookings across platforms.

slogans.automation: If it can be automated — we automate it.
slogans.manual: If it needs hands-on care — we handle it.
